title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Automatic Enrolment Retirement Savings
heading: 2. The Automatic Enrolment Retirement Savings System Act 2024
text_raw:
2. The Automatic Enrolment Retirement Savings System Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 500 of 2024) is amended- 

(a) 

by the substitution of the following Article for Article 3: 

The 30th day of September 2025 is appointed as the day 
“3. 
on which Chapters 1 and 4 of Part 3 of the Automatic Enrolment 
Retirement Savings System Act 2024 shall come into operation.”, 
and 

(b) by the insertion of the following Article after Article 3: 

“4. 
The 1st day of January 2026 is appointed as the day on 
which the following provisions of the Automatic Enrolment 
Retirement Savings System Act 2024 shall come into operation: 

(a) Chapters 2 and 3 of Part 3; 

(b) Part 4; 

(c) Part 5; 

(d) Part 8; 

(e) Part 9.”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Social 
Protection, 

29 September, 2025. 

JOHN MCKEON, 

A person authorised under section 15 of the Ministers and 
Secretaries Act 1924 to authenticate the seal of the Minster 
for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd October, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [439] 3

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Automatic Enrolment Retirement Savings
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

On 29 April 2025 the Minister for Social Protection announced that the 
collection of contributions for the Automatic Enrolment retirement savings 
system called My Future Fund would begin from 1st January 2026. It had 
previously been planned to begin contributions from 30th September 2025. This 
order provides for the formal adjustment of the intended commencement dates. 

For operational reasons Chapters 1 and 4 of Part 3 of the Act will still be 
commenced on 30 September 2025. The commencement of the foregoing 
provisions is necessary to allow for the rolling-out of the electronic portal under 
which employers will be eligible to register their contact details etc with the 
Authority. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [439]
